problem.markdown: In the first law for open systems, which of the following components may be included in the rate of work done [mathjaxinline]\dot{W_s}[/mathjaxinline] ? [x] Stirrer work [x] Expansion Work [ ] Work done in pushing the fluid in at the inlet [ ] Work done in pushing the fluid out at the exit
problem.p: In the first law for open systems, which of the following components may be included in the rate of work done [mathjaxinline]\dot{W_s}[/mathjaxinline] ?

checkboxgroup.choice: Work done in pushing the fluid in at the inlet
Work done in pushing the fluid out at the exit
